abstract: The language to use when displaying the reverse lookup results.
overview:
## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeocoderLookupOptions/language] is the only option that you can set for the reverse geocoder. For example, `{ language: 'fr-CA' }` tells the server to send results localized to Canadian French. If you set it, this option overrides the language you provide in the Geocoder constructor.

# language

**Interface Property**

The language to use when displaying the reverse lookup results.

## Declaration

```swift
language?: string;
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeocoderLookupOptions/language] is the only option that you can set for the reverse geocoder. For example, `{ language: 'fr-CA' }` tells the server to send results localized to Canadian French. If you set it, this option overrides the language you provide in the Geocoder constructor.
title: language
